Title: Relates to establishing the general election campaign financing opt-in system to provide public funds to certain candidates
Summary: Establishes the general election campaign financing opt-in system which allows certain candidates to opt-in to receive non-matching public funds from the state to pay for qualified campaign expenses, with the condition that participating candidates may not accept any private, corporate or special interest funds.
LawCode: Add ยง14-204-a, amd ยง14-204, El L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to establishing the general election campaign financing opt-in system to provide public funds to certain candidates
